about-me.subtitle: Solve problems before code
about-me.body: A developer who had experience in building SaaS application using mainly React and Node JS. Provided solutions to fix application issues and improve performance. Automated calculation process with Python to increase the efficiency of the company. Had experience in Agile working environment and familiar with sprint planning, scrum meeting, and sprint retro.

about-me.subtitle: Design with detail
about-me.body: A Graphic Designer who had experience in building a SaaS application user interface using mainly Photoshop. Provided solutions to fix web application UI issues and improve performance. Involved in design projects, and responsible for thumbnailing, concept development, visual exploration, and concept refinement. Ability to escalate company brand awareness by identifying current creative industry trends and opportunities, and utilize it in company projects.

body: Improved process in getting customer data by using queries on Excel to retrieve data from Microsoft cloud database
Improved precision in selecting desirable data by filtering and integrating data using SQL query string on Excel
Designed consistent customer statement format by organizing Excel sheet using VBA code
Reduced time in producing customer statements by 70% by processing and calculating data with Python, and presenting data with Excel
Reduced human error in customer statement calculation process by 60% by processing and calculating data with Python
Increased simplicity for non-technical staff to produce customer statements by creating interactive elements on Excel sheets using VBA code
Increased visibility for the stock purchase team to compare history product purchase price by calculating and highlighting differences using Python and present in Excel
Increased online store conversion rate by 40% by reducing website loading time
Reduced online store website loading time by 80% by removing excessive DOM elements
Increased online store website performance score on Google by 64% by removing excessive DOM elements
Improved application's performance in creating new items by 90% by removing unused React components from re-rendering
Developed functionality for users to check their sales history in daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly format by creating sales history interval to retrieve integrated and filtered data
Published and hosted single page website by using AWS S3 bucket
Developed dynamic contact form for the static website by using AWS API Gateway, AWS SES and Node JS to develop AWS Lambda function
Developed customizable AWS serverless mailing function by creating documentation for the lambda function and publishing it on GitHub
Performed application version control by using Git
Enhanced application code integrity by using ESLint to enforce coding style
Increased the visual appearance of existing website by redesigning the website to align with design trend
Designed digital and physical contents for display and presentation purpose by using Adobe Photoshop and InDesign
Managed company online posts and digital contents by using WordPress back-end panel
Managed company website contents and social media contents by using WordPress and social media platform
Designed posters, printouts and brochures for presentation and advertising purpose by using Adobe InDesign and Photoshop
Increased brand awareness by redesigning company website to align with company strategies and design trend
Improved UI and UX by collaborating with developers to modify front-end code
Created visual identity design by using Adobe InDesign, Photoshop and Illustrator
Designed advertising poster, print out, media content and brochure by using Adobe Photoshop and InDesign
Improved website UI and UX by using Sketch and Adobe Photoshop
Supported front end programmer in developing visual content by using Adobe Photoshop to create UI components
Designed a platform in providing kitchen gardening information by developing an iOS application using Swift and XCode IDE
Created simple server for holding contents by storing contents in AWS S3 bucket with an accessible API gateway for retrieving data
Increased the precision of information for kitchen plants by researching relevant datasets on Kaggle and government open data website and processing data with Python
Improved visual appearance by designing UI components with Adobe Photoshop
Improved user experience by conducting random user tests and target user surveys and refining the application based on feedback
Managed each sprint cycle by performing sprint planning meeting, daily stand-up meeting, sprint review, and sprint retrospective
Redesigned Cafeezy website visual appearance by researching the company's goal, strategy and design trend, and creating prototypes using Adobe Photoshop
Created website demonstration for presentation purpose by designing interactive website using Adobe XD
Finalized visual appearance by conducting a presentation to key stakeholders and do modifications based on feedback
Increased brand awareness by redesigning Duuet website to align with its company strategies, goals and design trend
Managed design process by performing essential research, brainstorming, ideation, drafting, creation, and finalizing work based on feedback
Created new Duuet website by using Adobe Photoshop

Relevant Coursework: Algorithms and Data structures, Intelligent systems, Big data processing and management, Database analysis and processing, Business intelligence, Data warehousing, Software engineering
Honors/Awards: Graduate with High Distinction (2017)
